channel.title: Excel on Twenty-Six.Two
channel.description: Recent content in Excel on Twenty-Six.Two

item.title: Unit One
item.description: Monday, March 9th 2020 Zen of Data Gain an understanding of the course structure and general direction of the program Be exposed to high-level analytic strategies and tools. Introduce themselves and complete icebreaker activities. Wendesday, March 11th 2020 Egad It’s Excel! Students will feel fully proficient in basic Excel navigation and functionality Students will gain familiarity with the value of Pivot Tables and the steps for their utilization.
